ingredients.ingredient: 1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature
8 drops green food coloring, or as desired (Optional)

cookingTips: Butter and cream cheese must be at room temperature for the dough to work properly in a cookie press
Work in small batches to keep dough from becoming too warm, which prevents clean press patterns
Bake for just 8-10 minutes until edges are set but centers remain slightly soft
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand the importance of proper dough temperature and technique for successful spritz cookies with defined patterns.
